verbs.description: [ARG1: Asylum] [V: claims] [ARG0: from the U.S.] [ARG2: to Canada] doubled from 2015 to 2017 as the Trump administration pledged a hard immigration stance , according to federal statistics .
[ARG1: Asylum claims from the U.S. to Canada] [V: doubled] [ARGM-TMP: from 2015 to 2017] [ARGM-ADV: as the Trump administration pledged a hard immigration stance , according to federal statistics] .
Asylum claims from the U.S. to Canada doubled from 2015 to 2017 as [ARG0: the Trump administration] [V: pledged] [ARG2: a hard immigration stance] , according to federal statistics .
Asylum claims from the U.S. to Canada doubled from 2015 to 2017 as the Trump administration pledged a hard immigration stance , [V: according] to federal statistics .
